Token.Abstract: This document describes the C4Timer, a subclass of C4Object which contains an NSTimer.
Creates and returns a new C4Timer object that will begin firing automatically.

Parameter.Name: seconds
Parameter.Abstract: The time interval for the timer

Parameter.Name: object
Parameter.Abstract: The object to which the timer will send a message

Parameter.Name: methodName
Parameter.Abstract: The name of the method that will be sent to the object

Parameter.Name: repeats
Parameter.Abstract: A boolean value that specifies whether or not the timer will continuously fire

Token.Abstract: Creates and returns a new C4Timer object that will begin firing automatically, it will also pass an object to the method it triggers.

Parameter.Name: seconds
Parameter.Abstract: The time interval for the timer

Parameter.Name: object
Parameter.Abstract: The object to which the timer will send a message

Parameter.Name: methodName
Parameter.Abstract: The name of the method that will be sent to the object

Parameter.Name: infoObject
Parameter.Abstract: The object to pass to the method being called

Parameter.Name: repeats
Parameter.Abstract: A boolean value that specifies whether or not the timer will continuously fire

Token.Abstract: Creates and returns a new C4Timer object that will begin firing at a specified date.

Parameter.Name: date
Parameter.Abstract: An NSDate object stating when the timer will begin firing

Parameter.Name: seconds
Parameter.Abstract: The time interval for the timer

Parameter.Name: object
Parameter.Abstract: The object to which the timer will send a message

Parameter.Name: methodName
Parameter.Abstract: The name of the method that will be sent to the object

Parameter.Name: repeats
Parameter.Abstract: A boolean value that specifies whether or not the timer will continuously fire

Token.Abstract: Creates and returns a new C4Timer object that will begin firing at a specified date, it will also pass an object to the method it triggers.

Parameter.Name: date
Parameter.Abstract: An NSDate object stating when the timer will begin firing

Parameter.Name: seconds
Parameter.Abstract: The time interval for the timer

Parameter.Name: object
Parameter.Abstract: The object to which the timer will send a message

Parameter.Name: methodName
Parameter.Abstract: The name of the method that will be sent to the object

Parameter.Name: infoObject
Parameter.Abstract: The object to pass to the method being called

Parameter.Name: repeats
Parameter.Abstract: A boolean value that specifies whether or not the timer will continuously fire

Token.Abstract: Causes the receiver’s message to be sent to its target.
Calling this method will start the timer firing, if it is supposed to repeat it will continue to fire.
Calling this method will stop a timer from firing continuously.
Stops the receiver from ever firing again and requests its removal from its run loop.
Returns a Boolean value that indicates whether the receiver is currently valid.

ReturnValue.Abstract: YES if the receiver is still capable of firing or NO if the timer has been invalidated and is no longer capable of firing.

Token.Abstract: Returns a Boolean value that indicates whether the receiver is currently valid.

ReturnValue.Abstract: YES if the receiver is still capable of firing or NO if the timer has been invalidated and is no longer capable of firing.

Token.Abstract: Returns a Boolean value that indicates whether the receiver is currently valid.

ReturnValue.Abstract: YES if the receiver is still capable of firing or NO if the timer has been invalidated and is no longer capable of firing.

Token.Abstract: Returns the date at which the receiver will fire.

ReturnValue.Abstract: The date at which the receiver will fire. If the timer is no longer valid, this method returns the last date at which the timer fired.

Token.Abstract: Returns the date at which the receiver will fire.

ReturnValue.Abstract: The date at which the receiver will fire. If the timer is no longer valid, this method returns the last date at which the timer fired.

Token.Abstract: Returns the date at which the receiver will fire.

ReturnValue.Abstract: The date at which the receiver will fire. If the timer is no longer valid, this method returns the last date at which the timer fired.

Token.Abstract: Returns the receiver’s time interval.
Returns the receiver’s time interval.
Returns the receiver’s time interval.
Returns the receiver's userInfo object. The userInfo is the object that will be passed to the method the timer is targeting.
Returns the receiver's userInfo object. The userInfo is the object that will be passed to the method the timer is targeting.
Returns the receiver's userInfo object. The userInfo is the object that will be passed to the method the timer is targeting.
